data.title: Erica Barnes - Women's Basketball
data.meta_description:
Erica Barnes (23) Forward  - 2011 All-Pac-10 Freshman Team Honorable Mention

2013-14: Played in 26 games, averaging 8.9 points and 4.8 rebounds in her senior
data.text:
2011 All-Pac-10 Freshman Team Honorable Mention

2013-14: Played in 26 games, averaging 8.9 points and 4.8 rebounds in her senior season…Posted a career-high four blocks at Cal (2/14/14).

2012-13: Played in 29 games with 11 starts…Averaged 8.9 points and 5.2 rebounds in 24.7 minutes…Scored in double-digits in 14 games…grabbed double-digit rebounds in two games…had a season-high 15 points in two games, at North Texas (11/28) and vs. USC (3/1)…posted a double-double at Washington with 10 points and 10 rebounds (1/6).

Scored nine points versus Utah in the Pac-12 Conference Tournament (3/7)…Posted 15 points versus USC (3/1)…Added 10 points at ASU (2/24)…Recorded 12 points and three assists versus ASU (2/19)…Had 14 points and five rebounds at California (2/10)…Contributed nine points and six rebounds at USC (1/27)…Scored 12 points and grabbed seven rebounds at UCLA (1/25)…Posted 10 points in Arizona’s road win at Washington State (1/4)…Added 12 points in the Wildcats’ victory over Longwood (12/20)…Recorded 13 points and seven rebounds versus Weber State (12/16)…Had 11 points at New Mexico (12/8) and Long Beach State (12/2)…Contributed 10 points versus UTEP (11/23) and had 10 points and seven rebounds versus BYU (11/20).

2011-12: Averaged 30.9 minutes, 10.8 points and 7.4 rebounds in 29 games played, also earning 24 starts ... Missed the road loss at Washington State and the home losses to California and No. 4/4 Stanford because of injury ... Had a double-double in the first game of the season with 11 points and 10 rebounds in the win at Georgia Southern ... Also grabbed five steals ... Collected her second double-double of the season with 12 points and 11 rebounds in the win at Georgia State ... In 30 minutes of play in the home win over Wichita State, she scored eight points, grabbed nine rebounds and was 6-of-6 from the line ... Scored 15 points and had nine boards in the road win at New Mexico State ... Also handed out three assists while grabbing one steal ... Barnes had 12 points, eight rebounds, two blocks and one steal in the home win over North Texas ... Playing 40 minutes in the loss to BYU, she scored 17 points while collecting eight rebounds and one steal and blocking two shots ... Scored 11 points and had six rebounds in the win over Syracuse ... Had a career high 24 points and her third double-double of the season with 11 rebounds in the win against BYU-Hawai'i ... Collected her fourth double-double of the season with 13 points and 12 rebounds in the home win over Long Beach State ... In 24 minutes of action in the road win at Arkansas-Pine Bluff, she had 13 points, seven rebounds and one assist ... Barnes had five points, eight boards and two blocks in 32 minutes of play in the home win against New Mexico ... Collected seven rebounds, four points, one assist and one steal in the home win against UNLV ... In the road loss at ASU, she had her fifth double-double of the season with 14 points and 12 rebounds in 35 minutes of play ... Had 16 points, nine rebounds and two steals in the home win against UCLA ... In the home loss to USC, recorded 17 points, eight rebounds and three assists in 31 minutes of action ... In the road loss at Oregon, collected her sixth double-double of the season with 11 points and 12 rebounds ... Also had one assist and a career high three blocks in 38 minutes of play ... Hit the game-winning basket in the road victory at Oregon State ... Collected her seventh double-double of the season with 18 points and 11 boards ... Also blocked two shots in 40 minutes of play ... Had eight points, five rebounds and three blocks in 39 minutes of play in the home loss to Utah ... In the home loss to Colorado, she had eight points, nine rebounds and two assists ... Had eight points and seven rebounds in the road loss at Washington ... Only played two minutes in the road loss at Colorado and did not record any stats ... Had 17 points, seven rebounds and three blocks in the road loss at Utah ... In the home win over Washington State, Barnes had six points, three rebounds and two blocks ... Collected four points and one rebound in the home loss to Washington ... Had 20 points, two rebounds and one steal in the road loss at USC ... Barnes had six points, six rebounds, one assist and one block in the road loss at UCLA ... In the home loss to ASU, she had eight points, five rebounds and one assist ... In the opening round of the Pac-12 Tournament, Barnes had five rebounds, two blocks and two steals in the win over fifth-seed UCLA ... Collected six points and six rebounds in the Pac-12 quarterfinal loss to fourth-seed ASU.

2010-11: Played predominantly at the post in her first season at UA ... Named honorable mention All-Pac-10 Freshman Team ... Averaged 15.2 minutes, 5.9 points and 4.1 rebounds playing in 28 games ... Recorded her first collegiate double-double in her first collegiate outing in the OT win at Wichita State ... Tallied 16 points and 14 rebounds, including 10 on defense ... Also dished out two assists and grabbed one steal ... Against Northern Arizona, she scored seven points and grabbed eight rebounds in the 71-49 victory ... Scored six points and grabbed six rebounds against UAPB ... Also blocked one shot and logged a steal ... In 19 minutes of play vs. No. 8/8 Texas A&M, she scored four points and grabbed four rebounds ... Barnes recorded her second double-double of the season with 12 points and 10 rebounds in the win over Bradley ... Scored eight points and pulled down seven rebounds in the loss to Nevada ... Recorded her third double-double of the season with 10 points and 12 boards in the win at New Mexico ... Barnes scored 12 points and grabbed four rebounds in the win over New Mexico State ... Against the North Texas Mean Green, she had nine points and five rebounds ... Collected 10 points and seven rebounds in the win over Iona ... In the win over Oregon, she was one of six Wildcats to score in double figures with her 13 points ... In the loss to No. 4/4 Stanford, Barnes scored four points and grabbed two boards in 16 minutes of play ... Barnes had six points, six boards, a block and a steal in the loss at ASU ... In her second collegiate start in the win over Washington, she was 3-of-3 from the field and 1-for-1 at the charity stripe, good for seven points ... She also pitched in with two rebounds and a blocked shot ... In her third start of the season, she scored two points, grabbed four rebounds, had a block and a steal in the win over Washington State ... In the loss to California, she went 5-of-6 from the field for 10 points ... Also collected two rebounds ... She scored two points, blocked a shot and grabbed one rebound in the loss to No. 4/3 Stanford ... Was perfect in shooting in the win over ASU ... Went 4-of-4 from the field and 1-of-1 from the free throw line ... Also had one blocked shot and two rebounds ... She missed the wins at Washington State and Washington, the home loss to No. 11/9 UCLA and the home win over USC while recovering from a concussion ... In the Pac-10 Tournament win over Oregon, she scored four points, grabbed one rebound and handed out an assist in eight minutes of action ... Barnes had two points, two rebounds and a blocked shot in the Pac-10 Tournament win over USC ... In the Pac-10 semifinal against Stanford, she scored eight points, grabbed six rebounds, handed out two assists and blocked one shot ... Ended the season with three rebounds and a steal in the WNIT loss at Utah State.

High School: Two-time all-city selection at Sacramento High School ... Sat out senior season due to CIF transfer rules after moving to Rosemont High School ... Named team captain three years while also being named team MVP as a sophomore ... Helped the Dragons to 23-10 record during junior season while averaging 14.9 points, 10.3 rebounds and 1.5 blocks per game ... Posted season-best 24 points in win over Rosemont ... Tallied seven games with at least 20 points and scored in double figures in 29 of 33 contests including 24-straight to finish the season ... Posted personal-best 15 rebounds on three occasions, including back-to-back games in CIF playoffs against St. Mary's and Paradise ... Recorded 19 double-doubles on the season ... Averaged 17.1 points and 8.9 rebounds as a sophomore for the 26-3 Dragons ... Scored career-high 33 points on 14-of-18 shooting while tallying 13 rebounds and four steals against Rosemont.

Personal: Daughter of Eric Barnes ... Has two sisters, Anetra and Andrea Gibson and a brother, Dominick Wilcox ... Pre-business major at Arizona ... Father played football at University of Oregon ... Enjoys spending time with her friends and family.

I chose Arizona because ... it's an opportunity to contribute to a group of other girls wanting the same thing as you do and for the coaches and staff. Plus, playing in the Pac-12 is a great experience.
